00030 XWaveNGraph::XWaveNGraph(const char *name, bool runtime, FrmGraphNURL *item)
00031   : XNode(name, runtime),
00032   m_btnDump(item->m_btnDump),
00033   m_graph(create<XGraph>(name, false)),
00034   m_dump(create<XNode>("Dump", true)),
00035   m_filename(create<XStringNode>("FileName", true))
00036 {
00037   item->m_graphwidget->setGraph(m_graph);
00038   item->statusBar()->hide();
00039   m_conFilename = xqcon_create<XKURLReqConnector>(m_filename, item->m_url,
00040                       "*.dat|Data files (*.dat)\n*.*|All files (*.*)", true);
00041   m_conDump = xqcon_create<XQButtonConnector>(m_dump, item->m_btnDump);
00042   init();
00043 }
00044 XWaveNGraph::XWaveNGraph(const char *name, bool runtime, 
00045         XQGraph *graphwidget, KURLRequester *urlreq, QPushButton *btndump)
00046   : XNode(name, runtime),
00047   m_btnDump(btndump),
00048   m_graph(create<XGraph>(name, false)),
00049   m_dump(create<XNode>("Dump", true)),
00050   m_filename(create<XStringNode>("FileName", true))
00051 {
00052   graphwidget->setGraph(m_graph);
00053   m_conFilename = xqcon_create<XKURLReqConnector>(m_filename, urlreq,
00054                       "*.dat|Data files (*.dat)\n*.*|All files (*.*)", true);
00055   m_conDump = xqcon_create<XQButtonConnector>(m_dump, btndump);
00056   init();
00057 }
00058 void
00059 XWaveNGraph::init()
00060 {
00061   m_lsnOnFilenameChanged = filename()->onValueChanged().connectWeak(
00062     shared_from_this(), &XWaveNGraph::onFilenameChanged);
00063   m_lsnOnIconChanged = m_tlkOnIconChanged.connectWeak(
00064     shared_from_this(), &XWaveNGraph::onIconChanged,
00065     XListener::FLAG_MAIN_THREAD_CALL || XListener::FLAG_AVOID_DUP);
00066     
00067   m_tlkOnIconChanged.talk(false);
00068   dump()->setUIEnabled(false);
00069   
00070   m_graph->persistence()->value(0.0);
00071   clearPlots();
00072 }
00073 XWaveNGraph::~XWaveNGraph()
00074 {
00075     m_stream.close();
00076 }
00077 
00078 void
00079 XWaveNGraph::clearPlots()
00080 {
00081   XScopedWriteLock<XRecursiveRWLock> lock(m_mutex); {
00082       XScopedLock<XGraph> lock(*m_graph);
00083         for(std::deque<Plot>::iterator it = m_plots.begin(); it != m_plots.end(); it++) {
00084             m_graph->plots()->releaseChild(it->xyplot);
00085         }
00086       if(m_axisw) m_graph->axes()->releaseChild(m_axisw);
00087       if(m_axisz) m_graph->axes()->releaseChild(m_axisz);
00088       if(m_axisy2) m_graph->axes()->releaseChild(m_axisy2);
00089       if(m_axisx) m_axisx->label()->value("");
00090       if(m_axisy) m_axisy->label()->value("");
00091       m_plots.clear();
00092       m_axisy2.reset();
00093       m_axisz.reset();
00094       m_axisw.reset();
00095       m_colw = -1;
00096   }
00097 }
00098 void
00099 XWaveNGraph::insertPlot(const std::string &label, int x, int y1, int y2, int weight, int z)
00100 {
00101     ASSERT( (y1 < 0) || (y2 < 0) );
00102   XScopedWriteLock<XRecursiveRWLock> lock(m_mutex);
00103   {  
00104     Plot plot;
00105       plot.colx = x;
00106       plot.coly1 = y1;
00107       plot.coly2 = y2;
00108       plot.colweight = weight;
00109       plot.colz = z;
00110       
00111       if(weight >= 0) {
00112         if((m_colw >= 0) && (m_colw != weight))
00113             m_colw = -1;
00114         else
00115             m_colw = weight;
00116       }
00117     
00118       XScopedLock<XGraph> lock(*m_graph);
00119         
00120      // m_graph->setName(getName());
00121       m_graph->label()->value(getLabel());
00122     
00123       unsigned int plotnum = m_plots.size() + 1;
00124       plot.xyplot = m_graph->plots()->create<XXYPlot>(formatString("Plot%d", plotnum).c_str(),
00125          true, m_graph);
00126       plot.xyplot->label()->value(label);
00127     
00128       atomic_shared_ptr<const XNode::NodeList> axes_list(m_graph->axes()->children());
00129       m_axisx = dynamic_pointer_cast<XAxis>(axes_list->at(0));
00130       m_axisy = dynamic_pointer_cast<XAxis>(axes_list->at(1));
00131       plot.xyplot->axisX()->value(m_axisx);
00132       m_axisx->label()->value(m_labels[plot.colx]);
00133       if(plot.coly1 >= 0) {
00134           plot.xyplot->axisY()->value(m_axisy);
00135           m_axisy->label()->value(m_labels[plot.coly1]);
00136       }
00137       if(plot.colz >= 0) {
00138           if(!m_axisz)
00139             m_axisz = m_graph->axes()->create<XAxis>("Z Axis", true, XAxis::DirAxisZ, true, m_graph);
00140           plot.xyplot->axisZ()->value(m_axisz);
00141           m_axisz->label()->value(m_labels[plot.colz]);
00142       }
00143       if(plot.colweight >= 0) {
00144           if(!m_axisw) {
00145             m_axisw = m_graph->axes()->create<XAxis>("Weight", true, XAxis::AxisWeight, true, m_graph);
00146           }
00147           m_axisw->autoScale()->value(false);
00148           m_axisw->autoScale()->setUIEnabled(false);
00149           plot.xyplot->axisW()->value(m_axisw);
00150           m_axisw->label()->value(m_labels[plot.colweight]);
00151       }
00152       if(plot.coly2 >= 0)
00153         {
00154           if(!m_axisy2)
00155               m_axisy2 = m_graph->axes()->create<XAxis>("Y2 Axis", true, XAxis::DirAxisY, true, m_graph);
00156           plot.xyplot->axisY()->value(m_axisy2);
00157           m_axisy2->label()->value(m_labels[plot.coly2]);
00158         }
00159       plot.xyplot->maxCount()->value(rowCount());
00160       plot.xyplot->maxCount()->setUIEnabled(false);
00161       plot.xyplot->clearPoints()->setUIEnabled(false);
00162       plot.xyplot->intensity()->value(1.0);
00163       if(m_plots.size()) {
00164           plot.xyplot->pointColor()->value(clGreen);
00165           plot.xyplot->lineColor()->value(clGreen);
00166           plot.xyplot->barColor()->value(clGreen);
00167           plot.xyplot->displayMajorGrid()->value(false);
00168         }
00169      
00170      m_plots.push_back(plot);
00171   }
00172 }

00174 void
00175 XWaveNGraph::setColCount(unsigned int n, const char **labels)
00176 {
00177   XScopedWriteLock<XRecursiveRWLock> lock(m_mutex);
00178   m_colcnt = n;
00179   m_labels.resize(m_colcnt);
00180   for(unsigned int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00181     m_labels[i] = labels[i];
00182   }
00183 }
00184 void
00185 XWaveNGraph::setLabel(unsigned int col, const char *label)
00186 {
00187     m_labels[col] = label;
00188 }
00189 void
00190 XWaveNGraph::setRowCount(unsigned int n) {
00191   XScopedWriteLock<XRecursiveRWLock> lock(m_mutex);
00192   m_cols.resize(m_colcnt * n);
00193     for(std::deque<Plot>::iterator it = m_plots.begin(); it != m_plots.end(); it++) {
00194         it->xyplot->maxCount()->value(n);
00195     }
00196 }

00198 void
00199 XWaveNGraph::readLock() const
00200 {
00201     m_mutex.readLock();
00202 }
00203 void
00204 XWaveNGraph::readUnlock() const
00205 {
00206     m_mutex.readUnlock();
00207 }
00208 void
00209 XWaveNGraph::writeLock()
00210 {
00211   m_mutex.writeLock();
00212   m_graph->lock();
00213 }
00214 
00215 void
00216 XWaveNGraph::writeUnlock(bool updategraph)
00217 {
00218   if(updategraph) {
00219       m_mutex.writeUnlockNReadLock();
00220       drawGraph();
00221       m_graph->unlock();
00222       m_mutex.readUnlock();
00223     }
00224   else {
00225       m_graph->unlock();
00226       m_mutex.writeUnlock();
00227   }
00228 }

00230 void
00231 XWaveNGraph::onIconChanged(const bool &v)
00232 {
00233     if(!v)
00234         m_btnDump->setIconSet( KApplication::kApplication()->iconLoader()->loadIconSet("filesave", 
00235                 KIcon::Toolbar, KIcon::SizeSmall, true ) );
00236     else
00237         m_btnDump->setIconSet( KApplication::kApplication()->iconLoader()->loadIconSet("redo", 
00238                 KIcon::Toolbar, KIcon::SizeSmall, true ) );
00239 }
00240 void
00241 XWaveNGraph::onFilenameChanged(const shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> &)
00242 {
00243    {   XScopedLock<XMutex> lock(m_filemutex);
00244       
00245       if(m_stream.is_open()) m_stream.close();
00246       m_stream.clear();
00247       m_stream.open((const char*)QString(filename()->to_str()).local8Bit(), OFSMODE);
00248     
00249       if(m_stream.good()) {
00250           m_lsnOnDumpTouched = dump()->onTouch().connectWeak(
00251             shared_from_this(), &XWaveNGraph::onDumpTouched);
00252           dump()->setUIEnabled(true);
00253       }
00254       else {
00255           m_lsnOnDumpTouched.reset();
00256           dump()->setUIEnabled(false);      
00257       }
00258       m_tlkOnIconChanged.talk(false);
00259   }
00260 }
00261 void
00262 XWaveNGraph::onDumpTouched(const shared_ptr<XNode> &)
00263 {
00264   XScopedLock<XMutex> filelock(m_filemutex);
00265   if(m_stream.good()) {
00266     XScopedReadLock<XRecursiveRWLock> lock(m_mutex);
00267     
00268     m_stream << "#dumping...  "
00269         << (XTime::now()).getTimeFmtStr("%Y/%m/%d %H:%M:%S")
00270         << std::endl;
00271     m_stream << "#";
00272     for(unsigned int i = 0; i < colCount(); i++)
00273     {
00274             m_stream << m_labels[i] << " ";
00275     }
00276     m_stream << std::endl;
00277     
00278     for(unsigned int i = 0; i < rowCount(); i++)
00279     {
00280         if((m_colw < 0) || (cols(m_colw)[i] > 0)) {
00281             for(unsigned int j = 0; j < colCount(); j++)
00282             {
00283                 m_stream << cols(j)[i] << " ";
00284             }
00285             m_stream << std::endl;
00286         }
00287     }
00288     m_stream << std::endl;
00289     
00290     m_stream.flush();
00291 
00292     m_tlkOnIconChanged.talk(true);
00293   }
00294 }
00295 void
00296 XWaveNGraph::clear()
00297 {
00298   XScopedWriteLock<XWaveNGraph> lock(*this);
00299   setRowCount(0);
00300   { XScopedLock<XGraph> lock(*m_graph);
00301     for(std::deque<Plot>::iterator it = m_plots.begin(); it != m_plots.end(); it++) {
00302       it->xyplot->clearAllPoints();
00303     }
00304       m_graph->requestUpdate();
00305   }
00306 }
00307 void
00308 XWaveNGraph::drawGraph()
00309 {
00310   XScopedReadLock<XRecursiveRWLock> lock(m_mutex);
00311   {
00312       XScopedLock<XGraph> lock(*m_graph);
00313       
00314     for(std::deque<Plot>::iterator it = m_plots.begin(); it != m_plots.end(); it++) {        
00315       int rowcnt = rowCount();
00316       double *colx = cols(it->colx);
00317       double *coly = NULL;
00318       if(it->coly1 >= 0) coly = cols(it->coly1);
00319       if(it->coly2 >= 0) coly = cols(it->coly2);
00320       double *colweight = (it->colweight >= 0) ? cols(it->colweight) : NULL;
00321       double *colz = (it->colz >= 0) ? cols(it->colz) : NULL;
00322     
00323       if(colweight) {
00324           double weight_max = 0.0;
00325           for(int i = 0; i < rowcnt; i++)
00326                 weight_max = std::max(weight_max, colweight[i]);
00327           m_axisw->maxValue()->value(weight_max);
00328           m_axisw->minValue()->value(-0.4*weight_max);
00329       }
00330             
00331       std::deque<XGraph::ValPoint> &points_plot(it->xyplot->points());
00332       points_plot.clear();
00333       for(int i = 0; i < rowcnt; i++)
00334         {
00335           double z = 0.0;
00336           if(colz)
00337             z = colz[i];
00338           if(colweight) {
00339             if(colweight[i] > 0)
00340                points_plot.push_back( XGraph::ValPoint(colx[i], coly[i], z, colweight[i]) );
00341           }
00342           else
00343                points_plot.push_back( XGraph::ValPoint(colx[i], coly[i], z) );
00344         }
00345     }
00346     m_graph->requestUpdate();
00347   }
00348 }
00349 
00350 unsigned int
00351 XWaveNGraph::rowCount() const {return m_colcnt ? m_cols.size() / m_colcnt : 0;}
00352 unsigned int
00353 XWaveNGraph::colCount() const {return m_colcnt;}
00354 double *
00355 XWaveNGraph::cols(unsigned int n) {return &(m_cols[rowCount() * n]);}
